recordTypes.name: Final Tract/Parcel Map Check
recordTypes.description: Engineering/Technical Review of Proposed Final Tract and Parcel Maps for Approval by the Department of Public Works before recordation.

recordTypes.name: Request for Administrative Review - Pet Citations (English/Español)
recordTypes.description: To request initial administrative review and fee waiver of a Pet Citation issued by Ventura County Animal Services. [Español] Solicitud de Revisión Administrativa de Citación Animal de Ventura County Animal Services.

recordTypes.name: Business Approval and Tax Certificate - In-Town
recordTypes.description: If you're doing business in Camarillo, you'll need City approval and to pay an annual business tax. Our easy, all-in-one application takes care of both zoning and tax requirements. Just apply if you're starting up, relocating, expanding, or changing how you operate in town. Each location will need its own application, and we’re here to help every step of the way. This application includes Massage Establishment Permits.

recordTypes.name: 1. Signing Up and Accessing Your Profile & Records
recordTypes.description: Instructions on signing up for a ViewPoint Cloud Account and how to access your profile and records.

recordTypes.name: Annexation
recordTypes.description: To annex property into Camarillo.

recordTypes.name: Stormwater Review
recordTypes.description: To determine whether the project needs to develop a Post Construction Stormwater Management Plan (PCSMP) for review by Stormwater Division.

recordTypes.name: Appeal
recordTypes.description: To appeal a decision of the Planning Commission or Community Development Director.

recordTypes.name: 2. Applying for a Permit & Paying Fees
recordTypes.description: How to apply for a permit and pay any fees that are due.

recordTypes.name: Business Tax Certificate - Out-of-Town
recordTypes.description: Apply here if your business doesn’t have a physical location in Camarillo but still provides services or does work in the city. Out-of-town businesses are required to pay an annual business tax, and we’ve made the process quick and easy to get started.

recordTypes.name: Fats, Oils, and Grease (FOG) Wastewater Discharge Permit
recordTypes.description: The Camarillo Sanitary District (CSD) administers a Fats, Oils, and Grease (FOG) Source Control Program to protect the public and the environment through the regulation of wastewater discharges from Food Service Establishments. Please do not submit this application if the facility uses a septic tank.

recordTypes.name: Change Order
recordTypes.description: For processing of revisions to approved plans for review and approval by the Department of Public Works before construction in the field.

recordTypes.name: Live Entertainment Permit
recordTypes.description: Businesses like restaurants and cafes can offer live music or entertainment once they’ve received a Live Entertainment Permit. It’s a simple step to keep things fun, safe, and compliant.

recordTypes.name: 3. Receiving Your Permit or Other Document
recordTypes.description: How to view and print your issued permit, license, or other issued document.

recordTypes.name: Banner Permit
recordTypes.description: Permit to display banners for temporary business promotion or for community events that do not require a City Special Event Permit.

recordTypes.name: Change of Zone
recordTypes.description: Application for a change of zone or prezoning for annexation.

recordTypes.name: Commercial Planned Development (CPD)
recordTypes.description: For new commercial developments. To modify an existing commercial building or site, see the Modification application.

recordTypes.name: 5. How to Reach Us! About Us & Contact Information
recordTypes.description: How to reach us!

recordTypes.name: Solicitors Permit
recordTypes.description: Anyone selling goods or services door-to-door in Camarillo needs to have a Solicitor's Permit—including charitable organizations. To help protect our residents and businesses, the City conducts a background check on every applicant before a permit is issued.

recordTypes.name: 4. Scheduling Inspections
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to schedule an inspection.

recordTypes.name: Conditional Use Permit (CUP)
recordTypes.description: For new uses which are not permitted by right in the zone. To modify an existing Conditional Use Permit, see the Modification application.

recordTypes.name: Camarillo Sanitary District Permit  - Sewer
recordTypes.description: Camarillo Sanitary District (CSD) sewer permit application for the review of proposed repairs, improvements, new connections, and letters of availability within the Camarillo Sanitary District and within its sphere of influence.

recordTypes.name: General Plan Amendment (GPA)
recordTypes.description: To request an amendment to the General Plan.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for an Accessory Dwelling Unit (ADU)
recordTypes.description: Instructions on How to apply for a Patio Cover

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for an Addition to Existing Building
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to an Addition to Existing Building

recordTypes.name: Industrial Planned Development (IPD)
recordTypes.description: For new industrial developments. To modify an existing industrial building or site, see the Modification application.

recordTypes.name: Transportation Permit
recordTypes.description: Transportation Permits are for Oversize Loads travelling within City Limits.

recordTypes.name: Landscaping - New
recordTypes.description: Landscape plan check for new development projects.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Exterior Building Alterations
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Exterior Building Alterations

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Fireplace/Pizza Oven
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Fireplace/Pizza Oven

recordTypes.name: Landscaping - Modification
recordTypes.description: Landscape modifications in existing developments.

recordTypes.name: Land Division/Parcel Map (LD)
recordTypes.description: To subdivide land into up to four lots.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Foundation Only
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Foundation Only

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for HVAC (heating, ventilation, air conditioning) Change-Out
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for HVAC Change-Out

recordTypes.name: Soils/Geotechnical Review (including Fault Investigation and Slope Stability)
recordTypes.description:
The process to review soils reports including, but not limited to, Fault Investigation and Slope Stability Analysis.
Soils reports must be prepared in accordance with the CITY OF CAMARILLO GUIDELINES FOR THE PREPARATION OF GEOTECHNICAL AND GEOLOGICAL STUDIES available upon request or on the City's Website.

recordTypes.name: Lot Line Adjustment/Parcel Merger
recordTypes.description: Application for lot line adjustment or parcel merger, resulting in no increase in number of lots.

recordTypes.name: Mapping Information for Noticing
recordTypes.description: To request a radius map, list of property owners, and certification of the property owner's list.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Light Poles, Flag Poles, etc.
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Light Poles, Flag Poles, etc.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Line Repair/Replacement - Sewer/Water/Gas
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Line Repair/Replacement - Sewer/Water/Gas

recordTypes.name: Master Sign Program
recordTypes.description: For new or modified Master Sign Programs.

recordTypes.name: Modification (MOD)
recordTypes.description: To modify an existing Planned Development Permit (CPD/IPD/RPD), Conditional Use Permit (CUP), Wireless Communication Facility Administrative Permit, or approved Tentative Subdivision Maps (Parcel Maps/Tract Maps).

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Manufactured Home, Mobile Home, Accessory Structures
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Manufactured Home, Mobile Home, Accessory Structures

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Other Accessory Structures
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Other Accessory Structures

recordTypes.name: Pre-Application Review
recordTypes.description: Preliminary review to provide information on potential issues with a project before a formal submittal.

recordTypes.name: Residential Planned Development (RPD)
recordTypes.description: For new residential developments. To modify an existing residential building or site, see the Modification application or the Zone Clearance/Building Permit application.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Photovoltaic (Solar)
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Photovoltaic (Solar)

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Replace Insulation
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Replace Insulation

recordTypes.name: SB 330 Preliminary Application
recordTypes.description: Preliminary application for housing development projects seeking vesting rights pursuant to SB 330.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Replace/Repair Siding or Stucco
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Replace/Repair Siding or Stucco

recordTypes.name: Special Event Permit (SPEV)
recordTypes.description: Required for most outdoor events such as concerts, carnivals, circuses, parking lot sales, marathons, or non-profit charitable events. Application must be filed 6-8 weeks prior to the event.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for a Re-Roof
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for a Re-Roof

recordTypes.name: Special Event Permit (SPEV) - Filming
recordTypes.description: Application must be filed with the Department of Community Development at least 7 days prior to the start of filming.

recordTypes.name: Special Event Permit (SPEV) - Animals
recordTypes.description: Application for youth animal projects (4-H) or the keeping of wild birds. Must be submitted at least 30 days prior to the start of the use.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Service Panel Upgrade
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Service Panel Upgrade

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for SolarApp+ Only
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for SolarApp+

recordTypes.name: Specific Plan Amendment (SPA)
recordTypes.description: To request an amendment to a Specific Plan.

recordTypes.name: Street Furniture Permit
recordTypes.description: To place street furniture on the public sidewalk area in the Camarillo Old Town Zone.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Swimming Pool/Spa
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Swimming Pool/Spa

recordTypes.name: Zone Clearance/Building Permit
recordTypes.description: Zone Clearance and Building Permit for residential and non-residential work. This application includes Sign Permits, but does not include landscaping.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Temporary Power Pole
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Temporary Power Pole

recordTypes.name: Temporary Use Permit (TUP)
recordTypes.description: To allow for the short-term placement of uses not permitted permanently.

recordTypes.name: Tentative Tract Map (TT)
recordTypes.description: To subdivide land into five or more parcels.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Wall/Fence
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Wall/Fence

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Demolition
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Demolition

recordTypes.name: Time Extension
recordTypes.description: To extend the expiration date of an approved entitlement (CPD/IPD/RPD/CUP). Not for building permits.

recordTypes.name: Variance
recordTypes.description: To request a variance from development standards, for properties with an exceptionally irregular layout.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Water Heater Change-Out
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Water Heater Change-Out

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Windows/Doors/Skylights/Solar Tubes
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Windows/Doors/Skylights/Solar Tubes

recordTypes.name: Wireless Communication Facility Administrative Permit
recordTypes.description: For new wireless communication facilities in the public right-of-way.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Ordinance Amendment (ZOA)
recordTypes.description: For a non-City-initiated Zoning Ordnance Amendment.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Drought-Tolerant Landscaping
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Drought-Tolerant Landscaping

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for a Patio Enclosure/Sunroom
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for a Patio Enclosure/Sunroom

recordTypes.name: Zoning Verification Letter Request
recordTypes.description: To request a letter providing information regarding the history of a property, past records of approvals, and active code enforcement issues. For copies of plans, submit a Public Records Request.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Electric Vehicle Charging
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Electric Vehicle Charging

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Energy Storage System
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Energy Storage System

recordTypes.name: Encroachment Permit (EP)
recordTypes.description: Encroachment Permits for any work or construction, such as, but not limited to, driveway approaches, sidewalks, curb drains, trenches, sewer laterals, water laterals, and traffic control, within the City's right-of-way (streets), property and easements.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Cell Sites
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Cell Sites

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for Construction Trailer
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for Construction Trailer

recordTypes.name: Public Works Plan Check
recordTypes.description: Application for the Public Works Department's engineering technical review for private land development grading and improvement plans, water, sewer, and storm drain plans, hardscape and drainage plans, street improvement plans prior to issuance of any applicable/requisite permits.

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for a New Building
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for a New Building

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for a New Shell Building
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for a New Shell Building

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for a Patio Cover/Pergola
recordTypes.description: Instructions on How to apply for a Patio Cover/Pergola

recordTypes.name: How to Apply for a Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: Instructions on how to apply for a Sign

categories.name: Planning Division
categories.content: Camarillo's Planning Division of the Community Development Department is responsible for implementing zoning and development standards described in the City's Municipal Code.

categories.name: Business Tax
categories.content:
Welcome to Camarillo—We’re Glad You’re Here!

Before you get started, make sure your business is approved and your annual business tax is submitted. For most businesses, it’s a quick and easy process through our Business Approval and Tax Certificate application.

If your business involves live entertainment

categories.name: Help, Links, Guides & Other Information
categories.content: Thank you for making the switch with us from a paper system to a fully digital system! We know this transition will take time and we are here to help you through it. Check out these resources for helpful tips on getting started, and please feel free to reach out to us at Camarillo City Hall if you have any questions or need further assistance.

categories.name: Code Compliance
categories.content: <div><span style="font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;">Camarillo's Code Compliance Division of the Community Development Department is responsible for the implementation of the Municipal Code including zoning/land use, property maintenance, conservation, inoperable vehicles on private property, and substandard housing.  The Code Compliance Division is also responsible for enforcing weed and property maintenance ordinances, including weed over-growth of vegetation, inoperable or jun
